Short paths and load balancing
A routing algorithm delivers a packet with size i from source si to
destination ti.
Two desirable properties on routing algorithms:
Short paths: e.g. shortest path routing.
Load balancing: nodes are evenly loaded.

Short path load balanced routing
We propose an online algorithm with (log n)-approximate load
balancing ratio using only c-short paths.
